manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This boat set was named one of the BEST TOYS FOR 2 YEAR OLD BOYS by the prestigious The Toy Report! Fun Bath Toys for Boys and Girls, Toddlers and Older Kids This fun, colorful playset comes with four boats that float. Each boat has safely enclosed magnets that attach to the next boat in line with numbers 1 2 3 and 4. These top toys for boys and girls make a great gift. These popular bath toys for toddlers were issued a US government patent and offer a fun, educational way to learn about colors and numbers, as well as help enhance motor skill development and encourage imagination and creativity. Perfect Size for Little Hands With their small, round designs, these boats are easy to grip and free of sharp edges, which make them fun to play with. They make a super gift for young kids. And because they're made with such durability, kids can enjoy this popular set for years to come.

Makes a Great Gift Give the bath toys set that kids will play with at every bath and love you more for every time they do! Unlike competitors whose toys come in just a plain plastic bag, our boats come in a nice box you will be proud to give.

Best Value in Bath Toys Why pay extra for separate bath toys when you can get this most popular 4 boats in 1 playset deal today? With this affordable bath toy set play time is all the time! Kids can take these boats from the bath to dry land to a water table or pool and back again without skipping a beat. These versatile toys can go just about everywhere your kids' imaginations can take them.

Fun AND Educational These boats are a fun new way to learn about colors and numbers. The perfect size for little hands, these boats can easily attach together to form a boat train. This helps enhance motor skills as well as encourage imagination.
Makes Bath Time Fun These little boats make bathtime more fun! Well-made and durable these boats are built to last. These boat bath toys are a huge hit with kids.

A Great Gift for a Great Kid Kids love this fun bath toy boat set. It's affordable and a gift you will be proud to give. Get these bath toys today and make you and the special little guy or girl in your life happy for many bath times to come!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bath toy
reviews.reviewText: Live the boats for the bath, pool or just for play. Durable and perfect size for a toddler

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these! I bought them for my nephew for his birthday and he loved them. They are so cool and fun to play with! I love how easy they are to clean too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great bath toy for the little ones; sturdy, colorful, and fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute little boats
reviews.reviewText: Bought twice as gifts for 1 year old birthday. Both children enjoy playing with them while taking a bath or in the pool. Well made good price. Don't get water inside and dry quick. Also like how they link together to play. Been using daily for 2 plus months and know they will last forva long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love these!
reviews.reviewText: My kids have been having fun with these for over a year. The faces and paint? on the boats have not faded at all. They float well and when they are lined up touching eachother (front to back), they magnetize lightly together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute bath toy.
reviews.reviewText: Got these for our neighbor's son's 2nd birthday!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered on time as stated.
reviews.reviewText: This is for a gift for my 1 1/2 old grandson. Looks like they are well made..The shipping even at Christmas time was delivered on time as requested. This is not a time to be getting gifts on a close time table, but it worked out better than expected. Time will tell!
